title: How to Watch Fox Online — Stream Super Bowl LIX, Animal Control, Masked Singer and More
description: The Super Bowl kicks off on Sunday, Feb. 9, at 6:30/5:30c on Fox. But if you’re a cord-cutter, you might be thinking: Where can I watch the Super Bowl online? Below, we’re breaking down all the ways to stream Fox so you can catch all the NFL action. How to Watch Fox Online Streaming If […]
author: Claire Franken
excerpt: Here are all the ways to watch Fox online — even if you've cut the cord.
text: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The Super Bowl kicks off on Sunday, Feb. 9, at 6:30/5:30c on Fox. But if you’re a cord-cutter, you might be thinking: Where can I watch the Super Bowl online? Below, we’re breaking down all the ways to stream Fox so you can catch all the NFL action. How to Watch Fox Online Streaming How to Watch Fox Online Streaming If you’re a cord-cutter who wants access to Fox, you’ll need to either get an antenna, or subscribe to a live-TV streaming service that includes your local Fox channel. Keep in mind, however, that even if a streaming service offers Fox, it doesn’t necessarily provide coverage in your area. Always double-, triple-, quadruple-check that the channel is offered in your area before signing up for a live-TV streaming service to stream Fox. Keep scrolling for more details on all the ways to watch Fox online. (Note: Fox is only available in select markets. Always confirm that your area is eligible for Fox before signing up for a live-TV streaming service.) Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: Sling Courtesy of Sling TVSling BlueOn Sale 50% off Sling is one of the most affordable cord-cutting options for accessing Fox live. The service offers three subscriptions with different channel lineups, but the Sling Blue plan is all you’ll need to access your local Fox network. (Remember, double check that Sling offers Fox in your ZIP code.) While there’s no free trial period for Sling, the live-TV streaming service is currently offering new users 50% off their first month, bringing Sling Blue down from $50.99/month to just $25.50/month. If you can access Fox through Sling and want a near-total replacement for cable TV, this is the most cost-effective service for livestreaming Fox. Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: DirecTV Stream Courtesy of DirecTV DirecTV Stream packages include Fox in certain areas, so you can choose between a few different subscriptions to find one that best fits your needs. The Choice package is the most popular option and costs $114.99/month. Plus, there’s a five-day free trial so you can watch Fox for free for almost a whole week. Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: Fubo TV Fubo is another great way to watch Fox online for free, thanks to its seven-day free trial, and its plans are currently on sale for $20 less than their original prices. For just $64.99/month, you can subscribe to Fubo’s Pro plan to gain access to Fox in certain markets, plus stream over 175 other channels. More good news? You can cancel and change your subscription at any time, making Fubo another easy option for watching Fox online. Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: Hulu + Live TV Courtesy of Hulu The Hulu + Live TV subscription is the most comprehensive plan that allows you to watch Fox online. For $82.99/month, you get tons of content with this bundle subscription. You gain access to the Hulu streaming library, Fox, ESPN+ and Disney+. This is a package for addressing all your cord-cutter needs, not just for watching Fox online. If you plan on subscribing to a live-TV streaming service to replace cable, this is the best option for you. If you’re just looking for a quick, cheap way to watch Fox, however, we recommend Sling. If you are a cable subscriber, you can watch Fox online for free at Fox.com by entering your TV provider. Otherwise, you can only watch Fox live online for free for a few days by utilizing a live-TV streaming service with a short free trial period, like with DirecTV Stream or Fubo TV.
html:
All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes.

The Super Bowl kicks off on Sunday, Feb. 9, at 6:30/5:30c on Fox. But if you’re a cord-cutter, you might be thinking: Where can I watch the Super Bowl online? Below, we’re breaking down all the ways to stream Fox so you can catch all the NFL action.

How to Watch Fox Online Streaming

How to Watch Fox Online Streaming

If you’re a cord-cutter who wants access to Fox, you’ll need to either get an antenna, or subscribe to a live-TV streaming service that includes your local Fox channel. Keep in mind, however, that even if a streaming service offers Fox, it doesn’t necessarily provide coverage in your area. Always double-, triple-, quadruple-check that the channel is offered in your area before signing up for a live-TV streaming service to stream Fox. Keep scrolling for more details on all the ways to watch Fox online.

(Note: Fox is only available in select markets. Always confirm that your area is eligible for Fox before signing up for a live-TV streaming service.)

Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: Sling

Sling Blue

On Sale 50% off

Sling is one of the most affordable cord-cutting options for accessing Fox live. The service offers three subscriptions with different channel lineups, but the Sling Blue plan is all you’ll need to access your local Fox network. (Remember, double check that Sling offers Fox in your ZIP code.) While there’s no free trial period for Sling, the live-TV streaming service is currently offering new users 50% off their first month, bringing Sling Blue down from $50.99/month to just $25.50/month. If you can access Fox through Sling and want a near-total replacement for cable TV, this is the most cost-effective service for livestreaming Fox.

Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: DirecTV Stream

DirecTV Stream packages include Fox in certain areas, so you can choose between a few different subscriptions to find one that best fits your needs. The Choice package is the most popular option and costs $114.99/month. Plus, there’s a five-day free trial so you can watch Fox for free for almost a whole week.

Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: Fubo TV

Fubo is another great way to watch Fox online for free, thanks to its seven-day free trial, and its plans are currently on sale for $20 less than their original prices. For just $64.99/month, you can subscribe to Fubo’s Pro plan to gain access to Fox in certain markets, plus stream over 175 other channels. More good news? You can cancel and change your subscription at any time, making Fubo another easy option for watching Fox online.

Where to Watch Fox Online Streaming: Hulu + Live TV

The Hulu + Live TV subscription is the most comprehensive plan that allows you to watch Fox online. For $82.99/month, you get tons of content with this bundle subscription. You gain access to the Hulu streaming library, Fox, ESPN+ and Disney+. This is a package for addressing all your cord-cutter needs, not just for watching Fox online. If you plan on subscribing to a live-TV streaming service to replace cable, this is the best option for you. If you’re just looking for a quick, cheap way to watch Fox, however, we recommend Sling.

If you are a cable subscriber, you can watch Fox online for free at Fox.com by entering your TV provider. Otherwise, you can only watch Fox live online for free for a few days by utilizing a live-TV streaming service with a short free trial period, like with DirecTV Stream or Fubo TV.
